package.name: Messagebird
package.summary: Use the power of SMS to increase customer happiness. Update customers on new orders, changes and shipments.
package.description: &lt;p&gt;MessageBird SMS is a powerful Magento module that lets shop owners send SMS messages to customers automatically. The module allows easy configuration what and when to send to customers. &lt;/p&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;p&gt;With an open rate of 95% - and email only being 30% - SMS is the ideal solution to keep customers up-to-date and improve their overall experience with your online shop. By doing so you increase customer happiness, which means you increase your recurring revenue.&lt;/p&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;h3&gt;Features&lt;/h3&gt;&#xD;&lt;br /&gt;&#xD;&lt;ul&gt;&#xD;&lt;li&gt;Send custom SMS messages on order placement to customer, seller or both.&lt;/li&gt;&#xD;&lt;li&gt;Send automatic SMS messages on status changes. For example: letting your customers know when their order is shipped.&lt;/li&gt;&#xD;&lt;li&gt;Use variables to personalise and customize SMS messages. For example: &amp;#x201C;Hi :firstname:! Thank you for your order #:orderid:. We'll start with it right away!&amp;#x201D;&lt;/li&gt;&#xD;&lt;li&gt;In many countries you can use your own sender ID like &amp;#x201C;PizzaPalace&amp;#x201D; or &amp;#x201C;ShirtDirect&amp;#x201D;.&lt;/li&gt;&#xD;&lt;li&gt;You can schedule your SMS messages so customers don&amp;#x2019;t receive messages at unusual times.&lt;/li&gt;&#xD;&lt;li&gt;Get live statistics on who received the messages and when, from our MessageBird dashboard.&lt;/li&gt;&#xD;&lt;/ul&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;h3&gt;Pricing&lt;/h3&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;p&gt;No setup fees. No monthly fees, just pay as you go. Exact pricing can be found over at &lt;a href="https://www.messagebird.com/en/pricing"&gt;www.messagebird.com/en/pricing&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;h3&gt;Support&lt;/h3&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;p&gt;Question or ideas how we can improve? Let us know at &lt;a href="mailto:support@messagebird.com"&gt;support@messagebird.com&lt;/a&gt;. We&amp;#x2019;re here to help!&lt;/p&gt;&#xD;&#xD;&lt;p&gt;Learn more about MessageBird and our services at &lt;a href="https://www.messagebird.com"&gt;www.messagebird.com&lt;/a&gt;.&#xD;More information on our API can be found at &lt;a href="https://www.messagebird.com/developers"&gt;www.messagebird.com/developers&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
